tracks.text: A man in a trenchcoat stares up at an ornate mansion. Atlantic Records Presents, Halestorm in Familiar Taste of Poison.
A woman in a black dress floats face down in a large fountain. Directed by Jeremy Alter.
Seen from below, the dead woman sings to us while floating. Her fingernails and lips are red, and her black hair floats around her face.
At night, the woman, Lizzy Hale, applies red lipstick while looking in a mirror. A figure in shadow watches from behind her.
Hale is a pale woman with medium length, wavy black hair, silver smoky eyeshadow, and bold red lips.
Hale, wearing a black dress, looks up from a verandah. A man with slicked back hair looks down at her from a balcony.
At night, the man watches Hale sleep.
Hale walks through the mansion halls at night.
She sings to us underwater.
The man in the trenchcoat walks into a dining room and looks around at the mansion.
Police officers follow behind him.
The man in the trenchcoat looks at a portrait of Hale.
Hale sings to herself in the mirror as she applies makeup.
Hale sings underwater, running her hands over her mouth.
The police photograph the dead woman in the fountain. The man in the trenchcoat, a detective, writes in a notebook.
The man with slicked back hair approaches the detective.
The police pull Hale out of the fountain.
In the mirror, Hale sees the man with slicked back hair, and smiles.
Police photograph Hale in a body bag. The detective kneels in front of her.
She sings in the body bag, a tear running from her face.
A medical professional pushes a gurney with the body bag through the mansion, past the detective.
A harsh light shines on medical instruments, and Hale's body.
The Medical Examiner talks to the Detective.
The man with the slicked back hair sits casually. The detective leans over him, talking intensely. The man smiles.
The detective grabs the man.
Vials spin in a carousel. The Medical Examiner hands the Detective a paper that reads Poisoned.
Hale sings to us from the water and to the mirror.
The man watches her sleep.
A dropper is inserted into a vial.
Hale screams underwater.
Hale lies in a coffin under a chandelier.
People walk by the coffin. A woman in black cries.
The man with the slicked back hair appraoches the coffin and looks at Hale.
The detective approaches. The man turns to look.
The detective shows a vial in a bag. The man takes a step back, and a cop holds his arms.
The detective looks at Hale. In the Medical Examiner's office, he looks at the word "Poisoned".
The man uses a dropper to apply serum to the red lipstick. Hale applies the lipstick in a mirror.
Hale sings from the body bag.
The detective closes the lid of the coffin.
Hale floats in the fountain, blood spreading around her face.
An officer zips up the body bag.
The cast. Femme Fatale, Lizzy Hale. Hardboiled Joe, Joe Hottinger. The Coroner, Arejay Hale. Evil Playboy Dr. Smith, Josh Smith.
Halestorm. Debut album available now.
www.HalestormRocks.com
Cut to black.
